alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Greater Rutherford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 9:17PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Rutherford and west central Cleveland Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 916 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles east of Forest City, or near Ellenboro, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Polkville, Ellenboro, Lattimore, Kingstown, Mooresboro, Bostic and Caroleen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
